column1: Local Foods////Local foods is amazing!! I love their crunchy chicken sandwich. The sandwich has so much flavor
column2: and it's made with fresh ingredients. If it's too messy to eat
column3: you can get it as a salad and it's just as delicious without the extra carbs! I didn't give the full 5 stars because I don't particularly like any of the sides. If you're a fan of super foods like quinoa and kale
column4: then the sides are perfect for you. However
column5: I'd like to see some more variety in the side options. I always end up getting fruit because I don't eat the sides anyways.
